snippet: The employee was stabbed in the chest after a fight behind the Al Oerter Recreation Center in Queens, and a co-worker was held, the authorities said.
abstract: New York City Parks Dept employee Ezra Black is fatally stabbed behind the Al Oerter Recreation Center in Queens, where he worked, after a getting into an altercation with co-worker Robert Swann; police apprehend Swann in nearby Flushing Meadows-Corona Park.
lead_paragraph: The employee was stabbed in the chest after a fight behind the Al Oerter Recreation Center in Queens, and a co-worker was held, the authorities said.

headline.seo: New York Parks Dept. Worker Is Fatally Stabbed in Queens
headline.main: Parks Dept. Worker Is Killed in Queens
headline.print_headline: Parks Dept. Worker Is Killed in Queens
